text: Credit : Angela Weiss / Getty Images Christina Grimmie ’ s Family Accept Award on Her Behalf at Humane Society Gala by 0 Shares Advertisement Christina Grimmie ’ s family is honoring their daughter ’ s life nearly a year after her devastating death. The former Voice contestant was recognized at the Humane Society ’ s annual To The Rescue! benefit in Los Angeles over the weekend. Her family was moved to tears when they accepted the Impact Award on her behalf during the ceremony. Rachel Platten performed “ Fight Song ” as a tribute to the 22 - year - old while an emotional video montage played in the background. Her mother and father, Tina and Bud Grimmie, and her brother, Marcus Grimmie, all went on stage to speak on Christina ’ s behalf and talk about her love
